project: Bootstrap Audit, J*=0 Fix, Sector Fee Breakdown

tasks.task: Audit main redistribution/welfare tables to verify bootstrap SEs are present and correctly computed
Update J*=1 calibration code: set J*=0 for non-large-firm sectors (0, 5, 13, 15) so no large firms exist in those sectors
Re-run J* calibration with corrected specification (J*=0 for sectors 0,5,13,15; J*=1 for sectors 7,9)
Run zero fees counterfactual using corrected J* calibration
Compute welfare effects from zero fees counterfactual and add to four-way comparison table
Create sector fee breakdown table showing card type effects by consumer group (cash/debit/credit users)
Document findings from sector fee breakdown - verify credit card intuition and diagnose regulated debit puzzle
tasks.notes: Credit intuition verified, debit puzzle diagnosed. Commit 83361fa
